name: SpaceAdventure
0:
”Alexa open Space Adventure”
”Alexa ask Space Adventure to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: space adventure
des:
Embark on an exhilarating auditory journey across the cosmos with Space Adventure. This immersive Alexa Skill transports you to the farthest reaches of space, where adventure awaits at every turn. As you navigate through nebulae, dodge asteroids, and explore distant planets, the captivating space adventure sounds will make you feel as if you're piloting your own spaceship.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Space Adventure
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
